name: ScrapTF Light chat theme
description: This style is meant to give the chat over at the Scrap TF website a make over to look brighter. The default themes the chat gives you are all very bland and dark, which might not suit some users' needs.
additional_info:
• V0.3 - Starting up
    • Added the color scheme to the start and join chat menu aswell.
    • Added the black name color to the dropdown menu aswell.
    • Played around with font sizes and weights so that everything is readable.

  • V0.2 - No tricks, no gimmicks!
    • Removed gimmicky chat-message-on-the-right. This isn't Tweetdeck.
    • Changed every person's color to blackish. You can now properly read light-colored names on a light-colored background. Hooray! (If there are suggestions on how to keep name color in while keeping readability, please do enlighten me)
    • Updated top bar to now have white labels all around. No more searching in the deep blue.
    • Did some work for future implementations. Secret features?

  • V0.1 - Initial release. A lot of bugs, and many name colors will not pop out of the background.
